name: Petit Bateau
description:
The game is about a paper ship moved by waves in order to avoid obstacles on a river. It's a little game in flat design, between Shmup and runner.

~~HOW TO PLAY~~

Hold left clic on your mouse while you slide your mouse to make a wave. Use wave to move your boat and survive much as possible ! ~~TIPS~~ Bird will attack after un short time if you stay too close of it. Crate explode with a big wave but move with a little. It contains scraps that can sink your boat !

Enjoy :D
